name: Enjoy Math
description:
"Enjoy Math" is a mathematical unique puzzle game, which will challenge your math and logical skills. Keep your mind sharp and healthy with help of "Enjoy Math" application.

How to play:

You will have a choice of two numbers and the operand (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division) that makes the result, which must match fixed result in blue squares.
You need to solve all the numbers before the timer runs out. Every time you solve all the numbers, the level goes up and so does the difficulty.

Features:

- Simple, yet challenging gameplay
- Timer
- Difficulty levels to up the longer you play
- Enhanced statistics (show off to your friends how good you are)
- Combos!
- Helps keep you sharp

Learn and train. Math can be cool and fun!
